description: A smart solution for maintaining optimal sugar levels using a web-app that integrates with a smartwatch. The app provides recommendations on insulin dose and calories one needs to burn to maintain optimal blood glucose control.
problemItSolves: Achieving optimal blood sugar requires multiple hospital visits which can be expensive and inconvinient. Undercontrolled blood glucose levels are a significant cause of complications arising out of diabetes and contribute to cost of care. By creating personalised reccommendation for insulin dose and physical activity, the web-app intends to enable self-care and improve overall outcomes for people with diabetes.
